Class Polygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • Polygon
  • public class Polygon
extends java.lang.Object
    The program presents a conveged polygon(Polygon with all angles smaller than 180 degrees)

        public Point highestVertex()
        this method return the highest vertex . if there is no vertex it will return null.

        The method checks whether a polygon is larger than the reference polygon.

      • findVertex

        public int findVertex​(Point v)
        The method checks that the vertex is on the polygon..
        Parameters:
        v - - a vertex check.
        Returns:
        the index of v in this polygon , -1 if v isn't on the polygon.

      • getNextVertex

        public Point getNextVertex​(Point dot)
        Get the next vertex in polygon by point.
        Returns:
        The point after passed point, same point in case polygon have only one same point or null in case of not existing point in the polygon. If the point received is not a vertex in the polygon, the method will return null

      • getBoundingBox

        public Polygon getBoundingBox()
        Returns the rectangle as a polygon parallel to the hinges blocking the polygon.
        Returns:
        The rectangle as a polygon. If the number of vertices less than 3 -null is returned
